H. P. F. Swinnerton-Dyer: New methods for Diophantine equations

Sir Peter gave four lectures in December, 2002. He has provided two sets of notes:
  • “Diophantine Equations: Progress and Problems” (pdf)
  • “A new method for certain Diophantine equations” (pdf).
Video of his lectures:
  • Lecture 1: video, slides.
  • Lecture 2: video, slides.
  • Lecture 3: video, slides.
  • Lecture 4: video, slides.
